internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the label that was used to identify the stimulus within the data.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this stimulus that may help you to more easily find it again.

dataLocation._instruction: Add all data files containing the stimulus content (e.g. movies, audio files, injected current traces).

description._instruction: Enter a description for this stimulus.

device._instruction: Add the devices used for this stimulus.
